title: Alias Transactions
description:
Stardust introduces a new output type called Alias Output that is essentially a UTXO state machine. Simply put, this represents a new type of ledger account suitable for committee ran smart contract chains. The main features are:

  1. storage of state commitments of the second-layer smart contract chains,
  2. globally unique address assigned upon creation,
  3. different account privileges for two controllers that can be rotated, and
  4. ability of issuing custom tokens that are linked to the unique address.
